StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: DELETECLASSROOM
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE GRUPO10.DELETECLASSROOM(pClassNumber IN VARCHAR2) AS&lt;br/&gt;BEGIN&lt;br/&gt; DELETE FROM Classroom_table clsr &lt;br/&gt; WHERE clsr.classNumber = pClassNumber;&lt;br/&gt; COMMIT;&lt;br/&gt;END deleteClassroom;
